thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho set for talks with Zlatan Ibrahimovic as club ready Antoine Griezmann bid | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho set for talks with Zlatan Ibrahimovic as club ready Antoine Griezmann bid | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Jose Mourinho set for talks with Zlatan Ibrahimovic as club ready Antoine Griezmann bid | Metro News
text:
Jose Mourinho set for talks with Zlatan Ibrahimovic as Manchester United ready Antoine Griezmann bid gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 8:46 pm Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho (Picture: Getty) 
Jose Mourinho is set to hold talks with Zlatan Ibrahimovic to discuss his future at Manchester United , according to reports. 
The Swedish striker signed a one-year deal with United last July but Mourinho wants to secure his services for another campaign. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
Ibrahimovic, who has enjoyed a superb run this term, is understood to be happy in Manchester and willing to commit to the club. 
However, The Sun say the 35-year-old is attracting attention from the MLS as well as clubs in the Chinese Super League. 
This has reportedly led Mourinho to decide to hold talks with Ibrahimovic, as United want assurances over his future as they prepare for the summer transfer window. 
The Red Devils have been strongly linked with a move for Antoine Griezmann and it is claimed the club want to know how much they need to set aside for the French star. Zlatan Ibrahimovic is expected to remain at Old Trafford for another season (Picture: Getty) Antoine Griezmann is wanted by Manchester United (Picture: Getty)
